expo.name: Finvera Mobile
expo.description: Complete GST & Accounting Mobile App for Businesses

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs access to camera to capture profile pictures and document photos for GST and accounting purposes.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs access to photo library to select profile pictures and document images for GST and accounting records.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs access to microphone for voice notes and audio recordings related to business transactions.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs location access to provide location-based business services and GST compliance features.
infoPlist.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app needs access to contacts to help you manage customer and vendor information for your business.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to calendar to schedule business meetings and GST filing reminders.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs access to reminders to set up GST filing and payment reminders.
infoPlist.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app uses Face ID for secure authentication and to protect your financial data.
infoPlist.NSAppleMusicUsageDescription: This app may access media library for document attachments and business-related media files.
infoPlist.NSMotionUsageDescription: This app may use motion sensors for enhanced security features.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app may use Bluetooth to connect with business devices like printers and scanners.
infoPlist.NSBluetoothPeripheralUsageDescription: This app may use Bluetooth to connect with peripheral devices for business operations.
infoPlist.NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription: This app needs local network access to connect with business devices and local servers.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app uses tracking to provide personalized business insights and improve app performance.
